title: Shell Chair (CH07)
body: Style CH07 chair originally designed by Hans J Wegner in 1963, manufactured from pressed laminated plywood with real wood veneers and available in a number of different upholstered finishes, elegant and a singles piece, dominant and commanding as a pair. Other wise know as the smile chair due to the front profile, the seating offers an almost floating appearance due to the winglike design of the structure. Padded delicately the chair offer comfort and stability from its three legs.
